name: cxpcld
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, (c0[^c]c1)∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cc))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

comment: Closure of the complex power function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
